title: The Professor at the Breakfast Table Cough

content.prompt: In context, the divinity-student’s “mild short cough” mentioned in the final sentence of the passage is best understood as

choices.label: an expression of contempt for the Poor Relation
a sign that he is preparing to speak
a foreshadowing of his failing health
a reaction to his dusty surroundings

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
